review_title: Great place to kick off your career in publishing.
pros: Pay was below industry average notwithstanding the wealth ELT experience and opportunity to connect with key stakeholders.
cons: Low base pay with hints of monopoly operation.

pros: Intelligent, mission driven colleagues. Strong company values. Fairly good talent development especially if based in the U.k. , US or one of the bigger international offices.
cons: Centralized and slow decision making. Dysfunctional senior management in Oxford (e.g. ELT Board). Central HR always staring big new initiatives but leaving them unfinished. Unable to arrive at a viable and effective digital content strategy.

review_title: Sales and promotion of ELT products.
pros: You get to come into contact with various educators and experts, which would help immensely with networking.
cons: You would be asked to work on weekends or holidays at times.

pros: well known company with a trustful image. 500 years long history makes company stay old
cons: long working hours , underpaid,management is inconsistent,  not diverse culture
